divs: Sighting DetailsIt was barely visible at first but my 11-year old spotted it while we were looking for Jupiter in mid-town St. Louis. I'm surprised my daughter spotted it because it was hard to detect. At first I did not see it when she said "shat's that?", but after she asked again I saw what at first I thought was a fast moving lone cloud, but then it was clearly a black triangle when overhead and made no noise. It only had some faint lighting around the edges, which may have been reflection from the city below. It disappeared over some high cirrus clouds, so I assume it was very large. It was stunning to watch and now to think about what it could be!
Summary: 2 people see Silent barely visible triangle pass high above mid St. Louis
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There were no other sightings in St Louis on or around November 17th 2012
